com.sun.grizzly.arp
Interface AsyncTask

All Superinterfaces:
Callable, Runnable, Task
All Known Implementing Classes:
AsyncProcessorTask
public interface AsyncTask
extends Task

A Task that wraps the execution of an asynchronous execution of a ProcessorTask.

Author:
Jean-Francois Arcand
